metadata.subject: Trump tariffs are in 'Stop, or I'll shoot myself in the foot' category: Ex-Treasury chief Summers

relationships.description: Richard Kahn is sending a news article to Jeffrey Epstein

analysis.purpose: To share a news article about Trump's tariff policies with Jeffrey Epstein
analysis.significance: Shows communication between Kahn and Epstein regarding economic policy matters

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: Document contains only a shared news article about Trump's tariff policies, no first-hand illegal activity

details: CNBC news article about Trump tariffs and Larry Summers' commentary

public_knowledge.context: Trump's tariff policies were widely covered in mainstream media in 2018

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a CNBC news article discussing former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers' criticism of Trump's tariff policies, characterizing them as self-destructive economic measures.
